short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable Youtube Limited Mode, and block videos that are specific to tags

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to hide the recommended videos on youtube.

By adding specific words to the blacklist, you can hide videos that  contain those words in their title and channel name.
